original_text: Thus shall ye say every one to his neighbour, and every one to his brother, What hath the Lord answered? and, What hath the Lord spoken?
korean_text: 너희는 서로 이웃과 형제에게 묻기를 여호와께서 무엇이라 응답하셨으며 여호와께서 무엇이라 말씀하셨느냐 하고

sentences.original_text: Thus shall ye say every one to his neighbour,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 각각 이웃에게 이와 같이 말하고

sentences.original_text: and every one to his brother,
and, What hath the Lord spoken?
